item.title: 【Requests】[REQ AUD] - Splash - Qu'Est-Ce Que C'Est? (S.A.W. production - 1986 7" vinyl)
item.description:
Hi all
A bit of a long shot but wondering if anyone have a vinyl rip of the 7" single of Qu'Est-Ce Que C'Est? by the UK group Splash? I'm looking for the 4 minute version/edit and it's basically nowhere - not on streaming or to digitally purchase, etc. From what I can see it was only ever available on the 7" vinyl single in 1986. There were multiple versions released such as:
https://www.discogs.com/release/1162374-Splash-QuEst-Ce-Que-CEst
https://www.discogs.com/release/3993273-Splash-QuEst-Ce-Que-CEst
https://www.discogs.com/release/1322514-Splash-QuEst-Ce-Que-CEst

It's a bit of a forgotten S.A.W. gem and I'd love to get my hands on the song in any format, lossless or lossy. The B-side would be nice too, but I'm mainly after the A-side. The copies on YouTube are either terrible-quality rips or have vinyl pops.

Thanks in advance!
item.author: anthonyv8
